alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 220 PM EDT/120 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Panama City Beach, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Ebro, Inlet Beach, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, Seaside, Point Washington, Pine Log, Sunnyside, Bunker, Laird, Laguna Beach, Hollywood Beach, Seagrove Beach and West Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
